en: "'Mr. and Mrs. Dursley, of No. 4 Privet Drive, "'were proud to say that they were perfectly normal, thank you very much. "'They were the last people you'd expect to be involved in anything strange or mysterious, "'because they just didn't hold with such nonsense.'
zh: 家住⼥贞路四号的德思礼夫妇总是得意地说他们是⾮常规矩的⼈家。拜托，拜托了。他们从来跟神秘古怪的事不沾边，因为他们根本不相信那些邪⻔歪道。
